message.entry: Registration has failed to converge.\nCheck the optimizer and metric configurations.\nIt may also be helpful to adjust the {0} parameter.
Registration failed because optimization diverged. Try reducing the {0} property of the optimizer.
{0}: Frobenius norm too small after {1} iterations. Current Frobenius norm ({2}) is less than epsilon ({3}).
{0}: Registered image does not overlap sufficiently with fixed image. Halting optimization.
